lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony was the first player Jerry Colangelo talked to about joining a new U.S. national basketball team program. Now, he's the last one standing.

headline.print_headline: Carmelo to Continue Record Olympic Basketball Career in Rio
headline.main: Carmelo to Continue Record Olympic Basketball Career in Rio
